Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.infinispan.registry.ClusterRegistry
    functionality replaced by InternalCacheRegistry; to be removed in ver. 9.0
    org.infinispan.query.continuous.ContinuousQueryListener
    replaced by ContinuousQueryListener; to be removed in 8.3
    org.infinispan.query.continuous.ContinuousQueryResultListener
    replaced by ContinuousQueryListener; to be removed in 8.3
    org.infinispan.lifecycle.Lifecycle
    use Lifecycle instead
    org.infinispan.distexec.mapreduce.Mapper
    Map reduce is being replaced by Streams
    org.infinispan.distexec.mapreduce.Reducer
    Map reduce is being replaced by Streams
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.infinispan.AbstractDelegatingAdvancedCache
    Extend from AbstractDelegatingAdvancedCache instead. This class will be removed in the future.
    org.infinispan.AbstractDelegatingCache
    Extend from AbstractDelegatingCache instead. This class will be removed in the future.
    org.infinispan.manager.AbstractDelegatingEmbeddedCacheManager
    Extend from AbstractDelegatingEmbeddedCacheManager instead. This class will be removed in the future.
    org.infinispan.interceptors.base.BaseRpcInterceptor
    Since 8.2, no longer public API.
    org.infinispan.interceptors.base.BaseStateTransferInterceptor
    Since 8.2, no longer public API.
    org.infinispan.io.ByteBufferImpl
    org.infinispan.query.continuous.ContinuousQuery
    replaced by ContinuousQuery; will be removed in 8.3
    org.infinispan.distribution.ch.DefaultConsistentHashFactory
    Extend from DefaultConsistentHashFactory instead. This class will be removed in the future.
    org.infinispan.io.ExposedByteArrayOutputStream
    org.infinispan.interceptors.base.JmxStatsCommandInterceptor
    Since 8.2, no longer public API.
    org.infinispan.affinity.KeyAffinityServiceImpl
    Extend from KeyAffinityServiceImpl instead. This class will be removed in the future.
    org.infinispan.distexec.mapreduce.MapReduceTask
    Map reduce has been replaced by streams. This can be invoked by cache.entrySet().stream()....
    org.infinispan.commons.hash.MurmurHash2
    Since 8.2, should always use MurmurHash3 instead.
    org.infinispan.distribution.ch.ReplicatedConsistentHashFactory
    Extend from ReplicatedConsistentHashFactory instead. This class will be removed in the future.
    org.infinispan.registry.ScopedKey
    in 8.2; functionality replaced by InternalCacheRegistry; to be removed in ver. 9.0
    org.infinispan.distribution.ch.SyncConsistentHashFactory
    Extend from SyncConsistentHashFactory instead. This class will be removed in the future.
    org.infinispan.distribution.ch.TopologyAwareConsistentHashFactory
    Extend from TopologyAwareConsistentHashFactory instead. This class will be removed in the future.
    org.infinispan.distribution.ch.TopologyAwareSyncConsistentHashFactory
    Extend from TopologyAwareSyncConsistentHashFactory instead. This class will be removed in the future.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder.fetchPersistentState
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder.ignoreModifications
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder.preload
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder.properties
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder.purgeOnStartup
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder.shared
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration.asyncListenerExecutor()
    This method always returns null now. Look for a thread pool named as GlobalConfiguration.listenerThreadPool() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfigurationBuilder.asyncMarshalling()
    since 8.0
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfiguration.asyncMarshalling()
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfigurationBuilder.asyncMarshalling(boolean)
    since 8.0
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration.asyncTransportExecutor()
    This method always returns null now. Look for a thread pool named as TransportConfiguration.transportThreadPool() instead.
    org.infinispan.server.memcached.configuration.MemcachedServerConfiguration.cache()
    org.infinispan.server.memcached.configuration.MemcachedServerConfigurationBuilder.cache(String)
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfiguration.consistentHash()
    Since 5.2, replaced by HashConfiguration.consistentHashFactory().
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfigurationBuilder.consistentHash(ConsistentHash)
    Since 5.2, replaced by HashConfigurationBuilder.consistentHashFactory(ConsistentHashFactory).
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.DataContainerConfiguration.dataContainer()
    data container is no longer to exposed via configuration at a later point
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.DataContainerConfigurationBuilder.dataContainer(DataContainer)
    data container is no longer to exposed via configuration at a later point
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.StoreAsBinaryConfiguration.defensive()
    Store as binary configuration is always defensive now.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.StoreAsBinaryConfigurationBuilder.defensive(boolean)
    Store as binary configuration is always defensive now.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.IndexingConfigurationBuilder.disable()
    Use IndexingConfigurationBuilder.index(Index) instead
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.TransactionConfiguration.eagerLockingSingleNode()
    starting with Infinispan 5.1 single node locking is used by default
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.TransactionConfigurationBuilder.eagerLockingSingleNode(boolean)
    starting with Infinispan 5.1 single node locking is used by default
    org.infinispan.commons.util.InfinispanCollections.emptyList()
    use Collections.emptyList() instead; to be removed in 9.0
    org.infinispan.commons.util.InfinispanCollections.emptyMap()
    use Collections.emptyMap() instead; to be removed in 9.0
    org.infinispan.commons.util.InfinispanCollections.emptySet()
    use Collections.emptySet() instead; to be removed in 9.0
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.IndexingConfigurationBuilder.enable()
    Use IndexingConfigurationBuilder.index(Index) instead
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.IndexingConfiguration.enabled()
    Use IndexingConfiguration.index() instead
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.IndexingConfigurationBuilder.enabled(boolean)
    Use IndexingConfigurationBuilder.index(Index) instead
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration.evictionScheduledExecutor()
    This method always returns null now. Look for a thread pool named as GlobalConfiguration.expirationThreadPool() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfigurationChildBuilder.evictionThreadPool()
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfigurationBuilder.evictionThreadPool()
    this returns the thread pool returned from GlobalConfigurationBuilder.expirationThreadPool
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration.evictionThreadPool()
    Use GlobalConfiguration.expirationThreadPool instead
    org.infinispan.AdvancedCache.filterEntries(KeyValueFilter<? super K, ? super V>)
    Please use Collection.stream() method on either Cache.entrySet(), Cache.keySet() or Cache.values(). The CacheFilters can be used to bridge between filter/converters and proper stream types
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncStoreConfiguration.flushLockTimeout()
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncStoreConfigurationBuilder.flushLockTimeout(long)
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncStoreConfiguration.flushLockTimeout(long)
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncStoreConfigurationBuilder.flushLockTimeout(long, TimeUnit)
    org.infinispan.distribution.ch.ConsistentHash.getHashFunction()
    Since 8.2, the Hash is optional - replaced in the configuration by the KeyPartitioner
    org.infinispan.AdvancedCache.getInvocationContextContainer()
    This method may be removed in a future version of Infinispan.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfiguration.hash()
    Since 8.2, use HashConfiguration.keyPartitioner() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfigurationBuilder.hash(Hash)
    Since 8.2, use HashConfigurationBuilder.keyPartitioner(KeyPartitioner) instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.IndexingConfiguration.indexLocalOnly()
    Use IndexingConfiguration.index() instead
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.IndexingConfigurationBuilder.indexLocalOnly(boolean)
    Use IndexingConfigurationBuilder.index(Index) instead
    org.infinispan.transaction.lookup.JBossStandaloneJTAManagerLookup.init(Configuration)
    Use JBossStandaloneJTAManagerLookup.init(org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration) instead since Configuration has no access to classloader any more.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.EvictionConfigurationBuilder.maxEntries(int)
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.EvictionConfigurationBuilder.maxEntries(long)
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfiguration.numVirtualNodes()
    No longer used since 5.2, replaced by HashConfiguration.numSegments() (which works like a numVirtualNodes value for the entire cluster).
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfigurationBuilder.numVirtualNodes(int)
    No longer used since 5.2, replaced by HashConfigurationBuilder.numSegments(int) (which works like a numVirtualNodes value for the entire cluster).
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration.persistenceExecutor()
    This method always returns null now. Look for a thread pool named as GlobalConfiguration.persistenceThreadPool() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfigurationBuilder.rehashDisabled()
    Use StateTransferConfigurationBuilder.fetchInMemoryState(boolean) instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfigurationBuilder.rehashEnabled()
    Use StateTransferConfigurationBuilder.fetchInMemoryState(boolean) instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfiguration.rehashEnabled()
    Use StateTransferConfiguration.fetchInMemoryState() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfigurationBuilder.rehashEnabled(boolean)
    Use StateTransferConfigurationBuilder.fetchInMemoryState(boolean) instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfiguration.rehashRpcTimeout()
    Use StateTransferConfiguration.timeout() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfigurationBuilder.rehashRpcTimeout(long)
    Use StateTransferConfigurationBuilder.timeout(long) instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfiguration.rehashWait()
    Use StateTransferConfiguration.timeout() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.HashConfigurationBuilder.rehashWait(long)
    No longer used.
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration.remoteCommandsExecutor()
    This method always returns null now. Look for a thread pool named as TransportConfiguration.remoteCommandThreadPool() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration.replicationQueueScheduledExecutor()
    This method always returns null now. Look for a thread pool named as GlobalConfiguration.replicationQueueThreadPool() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfiguration.replQueue()
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfigurationBuilder.replQueue(ReplicationQueue)
    Since 8.2, superseded by JGroups bundler functionality.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfiguration.replQueueInterval()
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfigurationBuilder.replQueueInterval(long)
    Since 8.2, superseded by JGroups bundler functionality.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfigurationBuilder.replQueueInterval(long, TimeUnit)
    Since 8.2, superseded by JGroups bundler functionality.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfiguration.replQueueMaxElements()
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfigurationBuilder.replQueueMaxElements(int)
    Since 8.2, superseded by JGroups bundler functionality.
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalSecurityConfigurationChildBuilder.securityCacheTimeout(long)
    Use GlobalSecurityConfigurationChildBuilder.securityCacheTimeout(long, TimeUnit) instead
    org.infinispan.query.dsl.QueryBuilder.setProjection(String...)
    to be removed in 9.0
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncStoreConfiguration.shutdownTimeout()
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncStoreConfigurationBuilder.shutdownTimeout(long)
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncStoreConfiguration.shutdownTimeout(long)
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncStoreConfigurationBuilder.shutdownTimeout(long, TimeUnit)
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.TransportConfiguration.strictPeerToPeer()
    Since 6.0, strictPeerToPeer is ignored and asymmetric clusters are always allowed.
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.TransportConfigurationBuilder.strictPeerToPeer(Boolean)
    Since 6.0, strictPeerToPeer is ignored and asymmetric clusters are always allowed.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.LockingConfiguration.supportsConcurrentUpdates()
    this option is always true and cannot be modified since version 5.3
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.LockingConfigurationBuilder.supportsConcurrentUpdates(boolean) 
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.TransactionConfiguration.syncCommitPhase(boolean)
    The syncRollbackPhase setting can no longer be modified at runtime. It must be the same on all nodes.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfigurationBuilder.syncMarshalling()
    since 8.0
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.TransactionConfiguration.syncRollbackPhase(boolean)
    The syncRollbackPhase setting can no longer be modified at runtime. It must be the same on all nodes.
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration.totalOrderExecutor()
    This method always returns null now. Look for a thread pool named as TransportConfiguration.totalOrderThreadPool() instead.
    org.infinispan.configuration.global.TransportConfigurationBuilder.totalOrderThreadPool()
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.TransactionConfiguration.useEagerLocking()
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.TransactionConfigurationBuilder.useEagerLocking(boolean)
    Starting with Infinispan 5.1 eager locking is replaced with pessimistic locking and can be enforced by setting transaction's locking mode to PESSIMISTIC.
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.TransactionConfiguration.useEagerLocking(boolean)
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfiguration.useReplQueue()
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AsyncConfigurationBuilder.useReplQueue(boolean)
    Since 8.2, superseded by JGroups bundler functionality.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AbstractStoreConfiguration(boolean, boolean, boolean, AsyncStoreConfiguration, SingletonStoreConfiguration, boolean, boolean, Properties)
    Use {@link AbstractStoreConfiguration#AbstractStoreConfiguration(AttributeSet, AsyncStoreConfiguration, SingletonStoreConfiguration) instead
    org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder(PersistenceConfigurationBuilder)
    Use AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder.AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder(PersistenceConfigurationBuilder, AttributeSet) instead
    org.infinispan.commons.configuration.AbstractTypedPropertiesConfiguration(Properties)
    use AbstractTypedPropertiesConfiguration.AbstractTypedPropertiesConfiguration(AttributeSet) instead
    org.infinispan.manager.DefaultCacheManager(String, String, String, boolean)
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.infinispan.eviction.EvictionStrategy.FIFO
